Key Match Events: Lionel Messi scored twice and assisted on another goal
Messi struck the woodwork with a free kick
Guatemala took an early lead but Argentina equalized in the eighth minute
Valentin Carboni was fouled, leading to Lautaro Martinez’s penalty shot
Enzo Fernandez’s ball over the top found Messi, who provided a perfect service back across goal for Lautaro Martinez’s second goal
Lionel Messi finished the scoring with a chip over the goalkeeper after a give-and-go with Di Maria
Post-Match Reflections: Scaloni said Messi going the full 90 minutes gave him a chance to look for something different and improve
Scaloni noted Messi’s kindness in giving up a penalty kick to Lautaro Martinez
